articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: New Al Nassr signing says work in Europe is done despite 'many opportunities' - BBC
articles.description: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo says his work in Europe is done despite having "many opportunities" to join other clubs before signing for Al Nassr.
articles.content:
'My work in Europe is done' - Ronaldo on Saudi move
Cristiano Ronaldo says his work in Europe is done, but he had "many opportunities" from other clubs before joining Saudi Arabian side Al Nassr.

articles.title: Google alleges India antitrust body copied parts of EU order on Android abuse - Reuters India
articles.description: Google has told a tribunal in India that the country's antitrust investigators copied parts of a European ruling against the U.S. firm for abusing the market dominance of its Android operating system, arguing the decision be quashed, legal papers show.
articles.content: NEW DELHI, Jan 3 (Reuters) - Google has told a tribunal in India that the country's antitrust investigators copied parts of a European ruling against the U.S. firm for abusing the market dominance of… [+3041 chars]

articles.author: Sharjah 24
articles.title: Ronaldo's switch to Al Nassr highlights Portugal star's fall - Sharjah24
articles.description: Sharjah24 - AFP: Cristiano Ronaldo's steep fall has been unveiled by his move to Saudi Arabia's Al Nassr, which heralds the end of his reign as one of football's most feared attackers. Ronaldo is no longer coveted by Europe's top teams.
articles.content: Ronaldo will be officially unveiled by Al Nassr on Tuesday after agreeing a contract that runs until 2025 and is reportedly worth more than 200 million euros.But the riches and fanfare that await the… [+1444 chars]

articles.title: Lions name squad for 'tough' European tour: 'We need to be more consistent' - News24
articles.description: The Lions have named their 29-man touring squad for their upcoming fixtures in the United Rugby Championship and Challenge Cup.
articles.content:
The Lions have named their 29-man touring squad for their upcoming fixtures in the United Rugby Championship (URC) and Challenge Cup.
